name: Darwings
description:
In this game :

As a scientific illustrator you will go in the depths of earth to identify species. Go deeper and deeper and draw your meetings.

It is crucial for the scientific advancement to post your drawings in the comment section !

Don’t worry about your technical level of your drawings !

The goal is to gather data to get consistent pictures of those species !

This game will only be available on download, at the end of your session you will find your drawings in the folder named Darwings_Data and in screenshots. For Mac users, the screenshots folder is in the Contents of the app.

In Web Build please don't forget to take screenshots of your drawings !

I hope you will have fun during this mission and after completing it by comparing your drawings with others !

I made this game entirely in 48 hours for the 48th Ludum Dare.
